name: Please Take a Step Back by Snoop Dogg &. GaryVee

metadata.name: Dreams Become True #1
metadata.description:
VeeFriends and Snoop Dogg came together for a new NFT collection that celebrates their collaborative song and music video, “Please Take a Step Back.” The collection features a unique combination of visuals and audio clips, created by VeeFriends. Each NFT is a 1/1 digital collectible featuring different combinations of rarity traits including background, lyrics, frame, and signature.

Inspired by the music video and message of the song, the collection reminds us to take a step back, reflect on our lives, and enjoy the present moment. Each NFT from this collection represents a theme and a lyric from the song, and features various characters, including GaryVee, Snoop Dogg, Very, Very, Very, Very, Lucky Black Cat, Turnt Tick, Flex ‘ N Fox, and Snoop Dogg’s Bored Ape “Dr. Bombay”. The “Please Take a Step Back” NFT collection offers a wide range of collectible moments for individuals to have the opportunity to own a piece of VeeFriends and Snoop Dogg history.

attributes.value: YEAH, IT'S TRUE THAT DREAMS BECOME TRUE IF IT HAPPENED FOR ME THEN IT COULD HAPPEN FOR YOU.
